result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kody Logan Rivera

records.addlTxt:
9:42 AM Apprs: CO: S. Needham, Rpr: V. Kasten, Clerk: B Harris, Defendant Kody Logan Rivera in court.  Attorney Stephanie Kay Schmidt in court for Kody Logan Rivera.  Prosecuting attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews file. Atty Schmidt states there is no offer at this time.  ADA Becker states there are some issues with victim witness, need more time to discuss the matter further.  DE verified address and phone number.  Bond continues. Adjourned at 9:44 AM. bph

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Filed by Atty Satorius,  appointing Atty Schmidt. sm

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, A. Phillips, through text message only and for child exchange only- only to occur at New Richmond Police Department parking lot.   The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

Contact for purpose of child exchange only and to only occur at Police Department parking lot in New Richmond

NG. Court orders bond. Adjourned at 2:34 PM. bph
